title: The Cure - The Perfect Boy (Mix 13)
description:
"The Perfect Boy" is a single by the British band The Cure which will be released on August 13 2008 on Geffen Records in the United Kingdom. The song debuted on May 9th in Fairfax, Virginia on the band's first concert of their 4Tour's North American leg. It would go on to be played at all 27 shows.

It is unknown at this time whether the B-side "Without You" is a retitling of a song called "Christmas Without You", a title that was mentioned in early press releases relating to the band's untitled 2008 album.

   1. "The Perfect Boy (Mix 13)" 3:24
   2. "Without You" 4:12
